meanings.definition: A person who is a member of the same club as another.
meanings.sent1: My clubmates and I meet every week to discuss our projects.
meanings.sent2: She introduced me to her clubmates at the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The clubmates decided to have a picnic in the park for a change.
meanings.sent4: Being clubmates is like being part of a big family.
meanings.sent5: I always look forward to spending time with my clubmates.

meanings.sent1: The clubmates gathered at the annual party for a night of fun.
meanings.sent2: We invited all our clubmates to the charity event.
meanings.sent3: The clubmates brought different snacks to share at the meeting.
meanings.sent4: In the crowd, I spotted my clubmates waving enthusiastically.
meanings.sent5: The group of clubmates cheered loudly for their team.
